english_example_sentence: If you sit at this VIP table, service will be faster.
russian_example_sentence: Если вы сядете за этот VIP-стол, обслуживание будет быстрее.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz bu VIP masaya oturursanız, servis hızlı olur.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz bu VIP masaya ______, servis hızlı olur.
